content: I've been using Lightroom to organize my photos, and I've been pretty happy with it. I've also been experimenting with different presets and editing techniques to enhance my photos. Speaking of which, I took some great shots of the blooming flowers and trees on April 20th, and I was experimenting with macro photography for the first time. Do you have any tips on how to create a cohesive look across a series of photos, like a photo essay or a project? I'd love to create a series of photos that tell a story or convey a mood.
